meanings.definition: A person who does not deviate from societal norms or expectations.
meanings.sent1: In the classroom, the nondeviants always followed the rules and never caused any trouble.
meanings.sent2: The nondeviants in the group were seen as the most reliable and trustworthy individuals.
meanings.sent3: During the game, the nondeviants strategically planned their moves to outsmart their opponents.
meanings.sent4: The nondeviants stood out in the crowd like beacons of conformity.
meanings.sent5: The nondeviants were like anchors, keeping the group steady and on course.

meanings.definition: Not deviating from accepted standards or norms.
meanings.sent1: Her nondeviants behavior at work earned her the Employee of the Month award.
meanings.sent2: The nondeviants approach to problem-solving ensured a smooth and efficient process.
meanings.sent3: The nondeviants color of the house made it blend in perfectly with the surroundings.
meanings.sent4: His nondeviants attitude towards challenges inspired others to stay positive.
meanings.sent5: The nondeviants design of the building was both practical and aesthetically pleasing.
